name: Rice With Mushrooms and Pistachios
recipeIngredient: 1/4 pound fresh mushrooms, cut into small dice, about 1 1/3 cups
1 1/2 cups fresh or canned chicken broth

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tablespoon of the butter in a saucepan and add the onions. Cook briefly, stirring, until wilted. Add the mushrooms and cook, stirring, about 2 minutes.
Add the nuts and rice and stir to blend. Add the broth, salt and pepper and stir. Cover and simmer exactly 17 minutes.
Uncover and stir in the remaining butter.
